example.eg: Raising your hand is the conventional way to get the teacher's attention.
example.egtrans: 举手是引起老师注意的习惯做法。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 惯例的, 习惯的, 传统的

example.eg: His clothes and his opinions are completely conventional.
example.egtrans: 他的着装和观点都完全墨守成规。

example.eg: We cannot possibly defeat our enemy using conventional warfare alone.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 常规武器, 传统武器

example.eg: In the middle ages the conventional wisdom was that the world is flat.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 传统观点, 世俗认知
